title: URATOT 2 Pack Cotton Yoga Sport Shorts Running Workout Dance Short with Pockets Athletic Shorts
features: Comfortable and high quality fabric: this shorts are made of 95% cotton and 5% polyester fiber, with good sweat absorption and air permeability; they are soft, skin-friendly and non-irritating, and they are very comfortable to wear

Classic design: in order to make your body slimmer, our shorts adopt three-dimensional cutting technology, which can lengthen your legs visually; and with 2 pockets, you can hold some small items; with comfortable elastic belt and a drawstring, you can wear freely

Wide range of uses: our shorts can be worn with T-shirts, vests, long sleeve shirts or any other clothes; you can wear them when you are dancing, going to the gym, running, doing yoga and pilates, sleeping, cycling, etc., or you can wear them in daily life, cool in summer and feel comfortable while doing yoga in warm room in winter

Color and quantity: our shorts are available in 2 different pure colors, each color is beautiful and versatile; the casual and fashionable style makes you more attractive in the crowd; the 2 suits are more suitable for daily change; please remember to wash them in cold water before wearing them

Good elasticity: high cotton content makes pants more elastic; it is comfortable to wear in the gym without too tight, which makes your movement flexible and free; you can check the size and color provided in the picture and select what you want
